titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Marina Urbach Collection on C Space Gallery MSS.577
titlestmt.author: Rachel Searcy

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-01-05 11:32:36 -0500.

did.unittitle: Marina Urbach Collection on C Space Gallery
did.abstract: Marina Urbach is New York City-based an artist and curator. This collection consists of materials collected by Urbach related to C Space gallery in New York City in the late 1970s. Materials include exhibition announcement cards and copies of a catalog for the 1976 "Style and Process" exhibition organized by Urbach. Of note is a exhibition announcement for the 1977 "Memory" exhibition at C Space organized by Marcia Tucker in cooperation with the New Museum.
did.physloc: Materials are stored offsite and advance notice is required for use. Please request materials at least two business days prior to your research visit to coordinate access.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of materials collected by curator and artist Marina Urbach related to C Space Gallery in New York City. Materials include exhibition announcement cards and copies of a catalog for the 1976 "Style and Process" exhibition organized by Urbach. Of note is a exhibition announcement for the 1977 "Memory" exhibition at C Space organized by Marcia Tucker in cooperation with the New Museum.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection has not been arranged by an archivist. The materials are arranged in the order in which they were received from the donor.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection is protected by copyright and/or related rights. You are free to use materials in the collection in any way that is permitted by the copyright and related rights legislation that applies to your use. For other uses you need to obtain permission from the rights-holder(s).

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Donated by Marina Urbach in April 2019; the accession number associated with this gift is 2019.037.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date; Marina Urbach Collection on C Space; MSS 577; box number; folder number or item identifier; Fales Library and Special Collections, New York University.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: At the time of accessioning materials were rehoused in an archival box and folder, and described on the collection-level with a box and folder list.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Marina Urbach is New York City-based an artist and curator who oversaw the C Space gallery. In 1976 she organized the exhibition "Style and Process" at the Fine Arts Building.
